mapper.sql: ID, CREATEID, CREATEDATE, REMARKS, VEHICLES, VEHICLENO, VEHICLETYPE, FUELTYPE, REGIONTYPE, BAK, BUYDATE, ENGINENUM, DEPTMANAGER, REGISTER, DELSTATUS, GPSCODE, MAXLOADNUM, MAXORDERNUM, VINNO, REGLOAD, MAINTAINMILEAGE, VEHICLEIMG, TYRENUM
mapper.select:
select a.ID, a.CREATEID,b.username, a.CREATEDATE, REMARKS, decode(VEHICLES,10,'配送车',20,'干线车',30,'公务用车',40,'备用车')as vehiclescn,VEHICLES,VEHICLENO, VEHICLETYPE,decode（FUELTYPE,0,'柴油',1,'93#汽油',2,'97#汽油')as fueltypecn,FUELTYPE, REGIONTYPE, BAK, BUYDATE, ENGINENUM, DEPTMANAGER, REGISTER,decode(a.DELSTATUS,0,'报废',10,'在用')as delstatuscontent,a.DELSTATUS,GPSCODE, MAXLOADNUM, MAXORDERNUM, VINNO, REGLOAD, MAINTAINMILEAGE, VEHICLEIMG, TYRENUM from T_SYS_VEHICLE a , t_sys_user b where a.createid=b.id
and vehicles= #{vehicles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and (vehicleno like'%'||#{vehicleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' )
order by DELSTATUS desc ,VEHICLENO

select ID, CREATEID, CREATEDATE, REMARKS, decode(VEHICLES,10,'配送车',20,'干线车',30,'公务用车',40,'备用车')as vehiclescn,VEHICLES,VEHICLENO, VEHICLETYPE,decode（FUELTYPE,0,'柴油',1,'93#汽油',2,'97#汽油')as fueltypecn,FUELTYPE, REGIONTYPE, BAK, BUYDATE, ENGINENUM, DEPTMANAGER, REGISTER,decode(DELSTATUS,0,'报废',10,'在用')as delstatuscontent,DELSTATUS,GPSCODE, MAXLOADNUM, MAXORDERNUM, VINNO, REGLOAD, MAINTAINMILEAGE, VEHICLEIMG, TYRENUM from T_SYS_VEHICLE where 1=1 order by DELSTATUS,VEHICLENO desc
mapper.insert: insert into T_SYS_VEHICLE (ID, CREATEID, CREATEDATE, REMARKS, VEHICLES, VEHICLENO, VEHICLETYPE, FUELTYPE, REGIONTYPE, BAK, BUYDATE, ENGINENUM, DEPTMANAGER, REGISTER, DELSTATUS, GPSCODE, MAXLOADNUM, MAXORDERNUM, VINNO, REGLOAD, MAINTAINMILEAGE, VEHICLEIMG, TYRENUM) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicletype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fueltype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regiontype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bak,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{buydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enginenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptmanager,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{register,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gpscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxloadnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{maxordernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{vinno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regload,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{maintainmileage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{vehicleimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tyrenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into T_SYS_VEHICLE
ID, CREATEDATE,
CREATEID,
REMARKS,
VEHICLES,
VEHICLENO,
VEHICLETYPE,
FUELTYPE,
REGIONTYPE,
BAK,
ENGINENUM,
DEPTMANAGER,
REGISTER,
DELSTATUS,
GPSCODE,
MAXLOADNUM,
MAXORDERNUM,
VINNO,
REGLOAD,
MAINTAINMILEAGE,
VEHICLEIMG,
TYRENUM,
BUYDATE,
s_sys_vehicle.nextval, sysdate,

#{vehicles,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vehicleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vehicletype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update T_SYS_VEHICLE
CREATEDATE = sysdate,
CREATEID = #{createid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VEHICLES = #{vehicles,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VEHICLENO = #{vehicleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VEHICLETYPE = #{vehicletype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FUELTYPE = #{fueltype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGIONTYPE = #{regiontype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BAK = #{bak,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUYDATE = #{buydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ENGINENUM = #{enginenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPTMANAGER = #{deptmanager,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REGISTER = #{register,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELSTATUS = #{delstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GPSCODE = #{gpscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAXLOADNUM = #{maxloadnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MAXORDERNUM = #{maxordernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VINNO = #{vinno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGLOAD = #{regload,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MAINTAINMILEAGE = #{maintainmileage,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VEHICLEIMG = #{vehicleimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYRENUM = #{tyrenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_SYS_VEHICLE set CREATEDATE = sysdate, CREATEID = #{createid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VEHICLES = #{vehicles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VEHICLENO = #{vehicleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VEHICLETYPE = #{vehicletype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FUELTYPE = #{fueltype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGIONTYPE = #{regiontype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BAK = #{bak,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUYDATE = #{buydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ENGINENUM = #{enginenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPTMANAGER = #{deptmanager,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REGISTER = #{register,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELSTATUS = #{delstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GPSCODE = #{gpscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAXLOADNUM = #{maxloadnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MAXORDERNUM = #{maxordernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VINNO = #{vinno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGLOAD = #{regload,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MAINTAINMILEAGE = #{maintainmileage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VEHICLEIMG = #{vehicleimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYRENUM = #{tyrenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
